summary: Adds another destruction mage to Skyrim. He has destruction and cojuration spells. Sometimes, if youre lucky, he uses dragon shouts, but this rearly happens, you wil enjoy him :)
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a companion that kicks ass!!!! His name is Rogvir and he can be found in the library inside the college of winterhold. He has a wide variety of spells, and he uses most of them, sometimes, if youre lucky he even knows a few dragon shouts (but this rarely happens, i only saw him perform it once). He has lvl 100 on destruction and conjuration magic.( This is my 1st mod, so please bare with me, and report any bugs etc to myself) enjoy :)
author: Pietpompies
